com.group17.controller

Class FeedbackController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.group17.controller.FeedbackController

  • @CrossOrigin
 @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/feedback",
                produces="application/hal+json")
public class FeedbackController
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles the feedback endpoint and any child/sub endpoints of it

      • findOne

        @GetMapping(value="/{id}")
public org.springframework.hateoas.Resource<Feedback> findOne(@PathVariable
                                                                                          java.lang.String id)
                                                                                   throws CommonException
        a sub-mapping for get requests will return a resource for one piece of feedback from the database
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the feedback to return
        Returns:
        the resource for the id given, if one exist
        Throws:
        CommonException - thrown if an entry in the database could not be found for that id

      • create

        @PostMapping(headers="Accept=application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> create(@RequestBody
                                                                                                          Feedback newFeedback)
                                                                                                   throws java.net.URISyntaxException,
                                                                                                          org.springframework.transaction.TransactionSystemException
        default mapping for a post request to the feedback endpoint
        Parameters:
        newFeedback - the body of the post request (should be in JSON format)
        Returns:
        a HTTP status of 201 'Created' and a link to the resource they just created (the endpoint to get that resource)
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException
        org.springframework.transaction.TransactionSystemException - will be thrown when the body of the request is not as expected (JSON format with a rating)

      • update

        @PutMapping(value="/{id}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> update(@PathVariable
                                                                                     java.lang.String id,

                                                                                     Feedback newFeedback)
                                                                              throws java.net.URISyntaxException,
                                                                                     org.springframework.transaction.TransactionSystemException
        a sub-mapping for put requests
        Parameters:
        newFeedback - the new feedback to save
        id - the id of the feedback to update
        Returns:
        a resource with the updated feedback
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException
        org.springframework.transaction.TransactionSystemException - will be thrown when the body of the request is not as expected (JSON format with a rating)
